channel.title: Boring Machine Learning
channel.description: Recent content on Boring Machine Learning

item.title: strptime and strftime
item.description: One weird trick about Python date formats # I’ve been working with date manipulation in Python as part of this Reddit challenge, which asks the programmer to find the year(s) in history when the most US presidents were alive given each president’s birth and death date. Usually, when working with dates and times in programming, it’s best to convert to object types that inherently have some assumptions about time and date already built in to allow for easy addition, subtraction, and date conversion.

item.title: venv
item.description: Creating a new venv # source Whosoever makes a static webpage that just has two things on it: 1. Unix/Mac/Windows command for creating a new venv environment 2. Unix/Mac/Windows command for activating new venv environment will achieve super-high search rankings almost instantaneously. — Vicki (@vboykis) October 8, 2019 Instructions # cd project_folder virtualenv venvname source venvname/bin/activate
